name: Creme Brulee French Toast
instructions: Place bread slices in bottom of 9 x 13‚Äù pan.
In bowl, mix eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, salt and sugar.
Pour over bread, cover and refrigerate overnight or until the egg mix is absorbed (at least 3 hours or overnight).
Remove from fridge for 30 minutes remove cover from dish and place in oven and bake for 30 minutes.
In pan combine butter and brown sugar.
Add syrup and heat until mix is bubbly.
Pour over toast and return to oven.
Bake about 10 minutes or until lightly browned.
Let stand at room temperature for 10 minutes before serving.
